Uses of Interface
net.sf.mmm.util.session.api.UserSession

  • Packages that use UserSession 
    Package Description
    net.sf.mmm.util.session.api
    Provides the API for utilities that help to deal with user specific settings.
    net.sf.mmm.util.session.base
    Contains public implementations of the session API.

    • Uses of UserSession in net.sf.mmm.util.session.api

      Subinterfaces of UserSession in net.sf.mmm.util.session.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MutableUserSession
      This interface extends UserSession with write operations to modify the user settings.
      Methods in net.sf.mmm.util.session.api that return UserSession 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UserSession UserSessionAccess.getSession() 

    • Uses of UserSession in net.sf.mmm.util.session.base

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.util.session.base that implement UserSession 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UserSessionProviderDefaultImpl
      This is the default implementation of UserSessionProvider.
      Methods in net.sf.mmm.util.session.base that return UserSession 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserSession UserSessionProviderDefaultImpl.getCurrentSession()
      Gets the current UserSession according to the current environment and client or server context.
      UserSession UserSessionProvider.getCurrentSession()
      Gets the current UserSession according to the current environment and client or server context.
